DOC.brief_title: Delayed Cord Clamping Very Low Birth Weight Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Immediately follow delivery , 40 % total blood volume available infant placenta . Over period 30 second 3 minute , significant portion blood transfer infant umbilical cord . Delayed cord clamp follow delivery facilitates transfer blood . Preterm infant susceptible effect anemia hypovolemia . A recent meta-analysis show brief delay umbilical cord clamping ( 30-60 second ) decrease risk anemia , blood transfusion , intraventricular hemorrhage , necrotizing enterocolitis , need blood pressure support delivery . The meta-analysis show impact Apgar score hypothermia due brief delay resuscitation effort allow delay cord clamp . Preterm infants significant risk IVH high 20 % low birth weight infant . IVH important cause brain injury infant . In study , would like determine optimal time delay cord clamp order prevent IVH infant .
